testimonials.testimonialText: I was moving to Austin and had no idea what my electricity usage would be in my new apartment. The usage estimator asked about my square footage, appliances, and habits - then gave me a super accurate estimate. My first bill was within $8 of the prediction!

Moving from California to Texas, I had no frame of reference for electricity costs. The usage estimator made it so easy - just answered a few questions about my home and got a realistic estimate. Helped me budget correctly from day one.

First time renting my own place and I had no idea how much electricity I'd use. The estimator was incredibly helpful - asked about my square footage, whether I have central AC, my thermostat habits. The estimate was spot on!

I was downsizing from a house to an apartment and wasn't sure how much my usage would change. The estimator helped me right-size my plan instead of overpaying for usage I don't need. Super helpful tool!

Moving into a bigger house with my family, I was worried about electricity costs. The usage estimator considered everything - square footage, number of people, appliances. Gave me confidence I was choosing the right plan size. Accurate within $12!
